files.patch:
@@ -204,3 +204,3 @@
-            # Don't use ps on cygwin since it sometimes misses
-            # some processes (!).
-            tasklist /NH | $grep " $1 " > $devnull 2>&1
+            # No longer possible to use tasklist as Cygwin PIDs are no longer
+            # same as Windows PIDs
+            $psCmd | $grep '^ *'"$1 " > $devnull 2>&1
@@ -284,1 +284,1 @@
-         psCmd=ps
+         psCmd="ps -W"
